revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Burned Tower |image = [[File:Burned Tower.png|thumb]] |caption = An outside view of Burned Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northwest of Ecruteak City. }} '''Burned Tower''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 88,500 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || colspan=2 rowspan=4|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || <center>360,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Weezing.png|40px]] Weezing || <center>320,000 |- | [[File:Shuckle.png|40px]] Shuckle || <center>610,000 |- |}
==Items== <!--T:6-->
<tabs> <!--T:7--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 2 || 52.08% || 50.75% || 44.97% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 26.04% || 25.38% || 22.49% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 20.85% || 22.19% || 28.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.12% |- | {{Bag2|Charcoal}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.12% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 2 || 50.45% || 50.45% || 50.45% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 25.23% || 25.23% || 25.23% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 24.22% || 24.22% || 24.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Charcoal}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |} </tab> </tabs>
